name: Velvet nails
description:
0.6 grams

Each container is more than enough to do one full manicure.

Super easy and fun to use, will stick to any nail polish! Pair with coordinating colors of polish or glitters for gorgeous results.

tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rw7XHnrJhuo

name: Nail Art Sticks
description:
How to use Nail Art Sticks:

*Use a razor blade to smoothly cut the Nail Art Stick into thin slices. 

*Apply clear or colored polish and apply the smoothly cut slices onto nail, finish it with another layer of clear coat on top. Easy!

Since we have so many different styles of Nail Art Sticks, we will choose them for you. Please understand occasionally some colors/designs may become out of stock. Therefore, substitutions of similar designs may occur.

They are about 6cm in length and .50cm wide you will get many uses out of one stick.

name: Planetary Eye Shadow (limited edition)
description:
Uniquely gorgeous color shifting mineral based shadow that is out of this world. So irresistibly pretty and mufti-faceted, people will get lost in your eyes. Comes loose in a jar.

5 grams

All Sinister Kiss cosmetic eyeshadow ingredients are approved for cosmetic use safely in the eye area and are 100% vegan, & cruelty free. 

*Planet Mercury
Unlike the other planetary colors in our line, Mercury is not a whitish powder with subtle shifts in hue. Instead, this shadow is super-saturated with color. Interesting depth!

*Planet Venus
Groovy color shifting eyeshadow. It appears to be a white powder, but when you apply the whiteness disappears as it turns a bright, luminescent purplish pink.

*Planet Earth
Groovy color shifting eyeshadow. It appears to be a white powder, but when you apply the whiteness disappears as it turns a bright, luminescent golden lime green.

*Planet Mars
Groovy color shifting eyeshadow. It appears to be a white powder, but when you apply the whiteness disappears as it bursts into a bright, shiny fuchsia red/pink glow.

*Planet Jupiter
Groovy color shifting eyeshadow. It appears to be a white powder, but when you apply the whiteness disappears as it turns a bright, luminescent gold-green.

*Planet Neptune
Groovy color shifting eyeshadow. It appears to be a white powder, but when you apply the whiteness disappears as it turns turquoise.

*Planet Pluto
Groovy color shifting eyeshadow. It appears to be a white powder, but when you apply the whiteness disappears as it bursts into a silvery glow.

name: Eyeshadow
description:
Singular shadows with HIGH color payoff (even without primer) for only $8 a pop!!! Each dreamy shade comes loose in a screw top container. 

5 grams

All Sinister Kiss cosmetic eyeshadow ingredients are approved for cosmetic use safely in the eye area and are 100% vegan, & cruelty free. 

*Diamond Sparkle
Super sparkly white diamonds!!! Pro makeup tip: Easy to blend with other colors to make them more shimmery!

*The Lady Wore Pearls
Classic, timeless, shimmery pearly white.

*Tarnished Silver
Subdued silver with black undertones for an aged, almost pewter appearance.

*Dream Smoke
Dirty, edgy, dark. A deep warm base with a slight purple shimmer. A must have for the perfect smoky eye.

*Lemon Meringue
Super bright primary yellow. Low sheen.

*Medallion
Shimmery bright gold. True golden color.

*Ancient Gold
A warm, red-orange hued gold with medium shimmer. The Aztecs would be jealous!

*Penny
Shimmery deep copper is highly pigmented and attention grabbing.

*Tasty Tangerine
Intense reddish-orange. Evocative!

*Lava
Hot, shimmery, deep red; like hot lava.

*Coral Reef
Pinkish orange shade. Very bold color with low luster. Doubles as a blush!

*Bellatrix
Bellatrix is an otherworldly green with golden sparks of personality.

*Esmeralda
Dark, medium sparkle gem toned green. Exotic and precious!

*Spring Green
A very vibrant green. Low sheen. A little goes a long way!

*Mermaid Blue
Shimmery pastel blue which gleams slightly green due to the golden highlights. Moody, gentle, serene, and oh so sensitive.

*Vintage Turquoise
Rich, vibrant blue. Low sheen. A blue lover's must have!

*60s Blue
A gorgeous retro blue, ready for your modern vision.

*Cosmic Blue
Smoky mystery, sensuality and elegance. Medium shimmer.

*Violet Delight
The color is a true purple, with black undertones and violet highlights

*Royal Purple
Lush, rich, and deep. Fit for a queen.

*Raven
Fundamental basic black. Low sheen.

*Dark Chocolate
A yummy rich dark brown with coppery undertones. Lovely easily build-able coverage.

name: Lipstick
description:
Gorgeous silky smooth, highly pigmented lipstick, only $5.99!   

All of our lipsticks come in a in magnetic 26mm tin for use in Z palettes.

All Sinister Kiss cosmetic ingredients are approved for cosmetic use and are 100% vegan & cruelty free.
